description.full: Welcome to Music Showcase - a monthly video package of the best music from a particular artist or group from the Sony BMG group of artists. Every month we will showcase a new single or album that's in the spotlight and offer a selection of video and interview content - as well as limited edition Gamer Pics and Theme Packs.
